data.prayer: Spirit, help the 50,273 believers find a person of peace today among the 612,427 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Mianyang, Sichuan, China
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 50,273 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.section_summary: On average, 49 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Mianyang, Sichuan, China.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the county of Mianyang, Sichuan, China. Please, stir the 50,273 believers here to pray for awakening.
Over 90.8 percent of the people of Mianyang are far from Jesus.
Lord, remember the Qiang, Dajishan people. Make the Qiang, Dajishan people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Mianyang, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the county of Mianyang to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Mianyang, Sichuan, China not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.
